title: Was This A Planned Operation? (Ep 1761)
description:
In this episode, I address the growing evidence that the hit on the Supreme Court was a planned operation. 

News Picks:


Dave Chapelle is attacked on stage while performing.


The real story behind the Hunter laptop. 

Russian oligarch who met with Hunter Biden sanctioned by the UK, but not the US. 


JD Vance wins big in Ohio.

Millions of tons of grain are stuck in Ukraine.

Disgraced President Biden is hemorrhaging black voter support now too.

Another troubling story about the growing food and fertilizer crisis.

Another troubling research study on mRNA vaccines.


13 states have trigger laws automatically banning most or all abortions if Supreme Court overturns Roe v Wade.
